manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Light drawing pad doodle board for kids. Doodle art is a good art form that helps kids think, focus and relax. It is good for kids' creativity, health, wellness, positive thinking, a memory-builder etc. Researchers all agree that learning through play is key to a child’s development. Jasonwell gives your kids both learning and play in one drawing pad. Juguetes para niños 3 4 5 6 7 8 años. Toddler birthday Christmas toys gifts arts and crafts for all ages 3 4 5 6 7 8 year old girls boys.

Pressure-Sensitive Flexible Screen The drawing pad sketch board adopts pressure-sensitive flexible screen Eyesight Protection No radiation, no glare, no blue light, no harm to eyesight. Safes for kids to doodle. No Mess Drawing Board Easy to draw or write down your great ideas on the screen. No paint or ink needed.

Shock Proof Drop resistant shock proof and water proof Long Lasting Only consume electricity when click erase button. Screw tightened battery compartment avoid little kid's access to battery Lock/Unlock the Screen Turn on the lock button to keep the drawings. You can still erase the drawings in a sec after unlocking. One Click Erase Simply press erase button,all drawings are gone in one sec.

Non-toxic & Safe Safety is our priority concern. The drawing tablet went through multiple inspections and tests before launched on market. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My grand daughter loves it
reviews.reviewText: This is fun and easy to use , it has pretty background colors that shine through when you draw pictures on it and if the picture isn't what you want it's easy to erase and start over

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple but perfect no mess drawing pad!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift for my 2 year old nephew, but also own similar versions for each of my boys (9,7,4). It is perfect for the car, plane, anywhere you want a mess free option for writing and drawing. It keeps my kids quiet and engaged which is always a win!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Its like an erasable chalk board with no chalk its pretty cool how things advance. My son loves it as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my 2 year old. He loves to use it. No set up, easy to use and carry around. Fits into his book bag! Just wish the wire that attaches pen was stronger. Popped off the second day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my 2 yo honestly like it better than the etch and sketch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Over 2 years later review
reviews.reviewText: We have two of these, currently our kids are now four and five, blue and pink, they still work perfectly, and they have been abused as you can imagine when a 4 and 5-year-old are using them and when they first got them they were only two and three. Now they're using them to practice writing, who would have thought something like this would survive Toddlers for over 2 years, still work perfectly, and now they're going to use it for practicing writing. Couldn't recommend this more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my 2 grandsons, 4 yrs old and 10 yrs old , perfect for both ages, parents said they’re great for winter days and they can’t get out to play

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what expected
reviews.reviewText: Item was not very well made. Was thin , not very sturdy...NIECE loved it though. Liked the way the letters changes colors
Buen producto para que los niños se entretengan dibujando un rato.

Highly recommend this toy as a gift for boys or girls of various ages. Nice that the pen is attached with a string. Bought them for my granddaughters and they love drawing pictures and then presses the button so they can start again. They also like the fact that they can lock the picture in place so it can't be erased until they unlock it. The toy is lightweight and travels and packs well. Older children can practise math questions or playing games like tic tac do. Great for in the car or when travelling on planes or trains.
L’intérêt que j’attendais de la part de mes petits-enfants est décevant.
Like the size and the design.Dislike the tiny screws to access the battery location. Batteries not available in Canadian stores over the holidays.
It works very well but it is way overpriced.
